step_1.desc: Go to https://developers.generativeai.google/products/palm and click "Get your API key"

step.desc: If you see this page make sure you're signed in to a google account and your region is listed here https://developers.generativeai.google/available_regions (If your region is not listed then you have to continue using the default token)

step_2.desc: If you're signed into a google account you'll be taken to this page (If you're not signed in, simply sign in and you'll be taken here). Click Create API key.

step_3.desc: Copy your API key (Make sure you store it somewhere safe and don't expose it to anyone)

step_5.desc: Enter the model you want to use (palm) and paste in your token. (Remember to never expose it, if you think you leaked it, you can always regenerate a new one)

step_1.desc: Go to https://platform.openai.com/api-keys and login/sign up

step_3.desc: Enter a name and click create

step_4.desc: Copy your token (Do not expose this, if you believe it has been leaked you can generate a new one)

step_6.desc: Enter the model you want to use (gpt) and paste in your token. (Remember to never expose this, if you think you leaked it, you can always regenerate a new one)
